main.aboutusdesc: Janar Store shine shagon shagon duk manyan shagunan General Store a duk faɗin duniya suna cikin masu rarraba kaya na musamman sanannun shahararru.
main.subscribedesc: Da fatan za a shigar da imel ɗin ku idan kuna son karɓar sabon labarai daga gare mu.
main.subscribesend: An aika da buƙata cikin nasara
main.viewregistereddata: Duba bayanan da aka yi rajista

title: Bada Away %s
subtitle: Yi rajista yanzu don samun damar lashe %s!

section1.sDesc1: A nan kawai zaku iya samun fa'idodi da yawa, masu sauƙin haɗuwa, mafi kyawun kyauta da sauran fa'idodi daban-daban

item.descItem2: Baya cajin wasu kudade lokacin karbar kyauta.
item.descItem3: Samu GiveAway a ƙasa da awanni 24!

timer.timerTitle: Kyautar shiga kyauta ta ƙare a:

banner1.bDesc1: Idan kayi rajista, duba imel dinka lokaci-lokaci don samun sabbin bayanai daga garemu. Hakanan zamu bada baucoci don siyayya a shagonmu kyauta. Me kuke jira! Farawa

section2.sDesc2: Zabi kyautar da kake so, haka nan zaka iya shiga cikin duk kyauta daga jerin da muka samar a kasa.

banner2.bDesc2: Ta hanyar rijistar kanka kawai za ku iya shiga cikin ba mu kyauta. Me kuke jira! bari mu Yi rijista kanka a yanzu.

section3.sDesc3: Samu kyauta kyauta a ƙasa da awanni 24! Kada ku rasa wannan damar da ba ta da kyau, yana da sauƙi, kawai kuyi rijista a gidan yanar gizon mu kuyi binciken (idan akwai), ba lallai ku biya komai ba. Barka da warhaka!

step1.ssDesc11: Don samun damar cin nasarar %s, duk abin da kuke buƙatar yi shi ne cika fom ɗin rajistar asusunka. Don farawa, kawai shigar da gasa tare da adireshin imel ɗin ku.

step2.ssDesc21: Da zarar kun shiga, zaku sami damar samun ƙarin shigarwar ta hanyar kammala ayyuka daban-daban, gami da ziyartar tashoshin yanar gizon mu.
step2.ssDesc22: Kuna da damar kammala yawancin ayyuka kamar yadda kuke so, kowane aiki yana ba da adadin shigarwa na musamman kuma kowace shigarwa mai nasara ce.
step2.ssDesc23: Hakanan zaka iya tsallake ayyuka don $ 1 kawai.

step3.ssDesc31: Anyi Nan da nan zamu tuntube ku bisa lambar da aka cika a lokacin rajista akan rukunin yanar gizon mu.

banner3.bTitle3: Bada Away %s a cikin Babbar hanya.
banner3.bDesc3: Wannan taron yana samar da wuraren samun nasara fiye da bara. Gayyaci abokai da dangi don manyan damammaki. Yi rijista yanzu kafin wannan taron ya fara.

section4.sDesc4: Wasu sake dubawa na waɗanda suka samu kyauta

theWinner.coment1: Na gode da Kudin, Ina fatan shagonku zai kasance mai yawan jama'a.
theWinner.coment2: Gaskiya wannan sanannen shagon GeneralStore ne, kunshin ya ci nasara Na karɓa, Samfur asali ne, kuma ban biya kuɗi ba. Na gode.
theWinner.coment3: Da farko ban yi imani da shi ba, amma bayan na tuntube su sai ya zama JanarStore ne. na gode GeneralStore na %s.
theWinner.coment4: Godiya ga allah da ya kara sa'a na, na gode da kyauta, GeneralStore ina son shi.

section5.sDesc5: Godiya ga cikakken goyon baya da ke taimaka mana koyaushe
section5.dSupport1: Kamfanin fasaha na kasa da kasa na Amurka wanda ke zaune a Seattle, Washington, wanda ke mai da hankali kan kasuwancin e-e-komputa, sarrafa kwamfuta, watsa shirye-shiryen dijital, da kuma fasahar kere kere.
section5.dSupport2: Kamfanin dillalan intanet na Amurka da ke sayar da kayan daki na farko wanda ke da hedkwata a Midvale, Utah, kusa da Salt Lake City. Patrick M. Byrne ya kafa Overstock.com a cikin 1999.
section5.dSupport3: Babban kamfanin sayar da kayayyaki na Amurka da ke gudanar da manyan kasuwanni, manyan shagunan ragi, da shagunan kayan abinci daga Amurka, wanda ke da hedkwata a Bentonville, Arkansas.
section5.dSupport4: Ba'amurke mai sayar da kayayyakin lantarki na manyan kasashen duniya mai hedkwata a Richfield, Minnesota. Richard M. Schulze da James Wheeler ne suka kirkire shi a 1966 a matsayin shagon keɓaɓɓen shago mai suna Sautin Kiɗa.
section5.dSupport5: Sabis na tallace-tallace na kan layi wanda yake a China mallakar Groupungiyar Alibaba. An ƙaddamar da shi a cikin 2010, ya ƙunshi ƙananan kamfanoni a China da sauran wurare, irin su Singapore, waɗanda ke ba da samfuran ga masu siye da layi ta duniya.
section5.dSupport6: Eungiyar cinikayyar kasuwancin e-commerce ta Amurka da ke San Jose, Kalifoniya, wacce ke ba da damar siyar da mabukaci da kuma kasuwancin-zuwa-mabukaci ta hanyar gidan yanar gizon ta.

section6.sDesc6: Idan kana da wasu tambayoyi game da samfur, ko kowane bayani da kake buƙata, da fatan za a yi jinkiri a tuntube mu.
section6.subject: Maudu'i
